original_title: Driveline Wins Bronze at the Presidential Environmental awards
original_body_lines: Driveline, a well-known auto care company in Sri Lanka, received the Bronze Award for its dedication to sustainability in the Vehicle Service Centers category of the Presidential Environmental Awards 2021–2022. Driveline concept was developed with over 25 years of experience in the motor car servicing industry locally and internationally and has proven its commitment to offering top-notch service and assisting in ensuring a sustainable future for Sri Lanka.

The Presidential Environmental Awards is a unique program that recognizes and empowers individuals and organisations that significantly contribute to building a sustainable environment. Organised and implemented by the Central Environmental Authority under the guidance of the Ministry of Environment, this prestigious recognition is widely regarded as the most esteemed award in the field of environment conservation and protection in Sri Lanka. On April 28, 2023, the BMICH hosted the award ceremony for the Presidential Environmental Awards 2021–2022, with the participation of Ranil Wickremasinghe, the president of Sri Lanka.
Driveline has made significant investments in environmentally friendly business practices and technology to make sure that its services are not only practical but also sustainable.

Although this investment wasn’t inexpensive, it has allowed Driveline to maintain its dedication to the environment while achieving unprecedented levels of customer satisfaction. Shan Kao – The head of Operations has played a major role in taking this initiative. Further, he says, more businesses like Driveline must take the lead in promoting sustainability and motivating others to follow as we transition to a more sustainable future.
